title: An Introduction to the frog
creator_credit: J. Arthur Rank Organisation, Gaumont-British Instructional and Thora James
brief_description: The frog is chosen as an example in an introduction to the subject of biology. The film shows the co-ordination between all systems of a typical vertebrate animal.
creator_credit_for_label: J. Arthur Rank Organisation, Gaumont-British Instructional and Thora James
